greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Period 16 zigzag sequence: repeat [0,1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8,7,6,5,4,3,2,1].
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,0,0,0,0,0,0,-1,1).
mathematica: With[{k = 16}, Table[Min[Abs[# - k], #] &@ Mod[n, k], {n, 0, 120}]] (* or *)
CoefficientList[Series[x (1 + x) (1 + x^2) (1 + x^4)/((1 - x) (1 + x^8)), {x, 0, 120}], x] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Dec 10 2016 *)
results.author: _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Dec 09 2016
